metadata.title: CVE-2024-39471 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: add error handle to avoid out-of-boundsif the sdma_v4_0_irq_id_to_seq return -EINVAL, the process shouldbe stop to avoid out-of-bounds read, so directly return -EINVAL.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
